bill.title: Senate Substitute for HB 2186 by Senate Select Committee on Education Finance - Creating the Kansas school equity and enhancement act.
bill.description: Senate Substitute for HB 2186 by Senate Select Committee on Education Finance - Creating the Kansas school equity and enhancement act.

history.action: House Introduced
House Referred to Committee on Judiciary
House Hearing: Wednesday, February 01, 2017, 03:30 PM Room 112-N
House Committee Report recommending bill be passed as amended by Committee on Judiciary
House Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Stogsdill
House  Representative Aurand raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Stogsdill was adopted  Yea: 66 Nay: 59
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Carpenter
House  Representative Trimmer raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled not germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Be passed as amended
House Engrossed on Tuesday, February 21, 2017
House Final Action - Passed as amended;  Yea: 72 Nay: 53
Senate Received and Introduced
Senate Referred to Committee on Judiciary
Senate Withdrawn from  Committee on Judiciary; Referred to Committee on Ways and Means
Senate Withdrawn from  Committee on Ways and Means; Referred to Senate Select Committee on Education Finance
Senate Committee Report recommending substitute bill be passed by Senate Select Committee on Education Finance
Senate Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
Senate Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted recommending substitute bill be passed

Senate Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Senator Pyle was adopted  Yea: 22 Nay: 14

Senate  Senator McGinn raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled not germane.
Senate Committee of the Whole - Ruling of the chair was sustained  Yea: 29 Nay: 10

Senate Committee of the Whole - Substitute bill be passed as amended
Senate Final Action - Passed as amended;  Yea: 23 Nay: 16
House Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
House Nonconcurred with amendments; Conference Committee requested; appointed Representative Campbell , Representative Aurand and Representative Trimmer as conferees
Senate Motion to accede adopted;  Senator Denning,  Senator McGinn and  Senator Hensley appointed as conferees
House  Representative Patton and  Representative Huebert are appointed to replace  Representative Campbell and  Representative Aurand on the Conference Committee
Senate  Senator Baumgardner and  Senator Denning are appointed to replace  Senator Denning and  Senator McGinn on the Conference Committee

House  Representative Johnson,  Representative Phillips, and  Representative Sawyer are appointed to replace  Representative Patton,  Representative Huebert, and  Representative Trimmer on the Conference Committee
House Died in Conference
